title: ranked promos
body: i would like to ask why i got bronze 5 when i won 6 games in promos and still didn't rank up even tho i managed to get to bronze 4 legit just after season 5 stopped i was wondering if there is any way that i could get at least back to my normal rank or higher i try my hardest in promos but got bronze 5 even after 6 wins {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: i won  9 out of my 10 games and i got placed in bronze 1 . . . thats total crap
I won 7 out of 10 and got b4, some of us would think you are very lucky to of gotten that.
agreed this ranked promos are broken
i am also disappointed by  the fact that wasting so many hours on league and still got no reward at all
